message: Redundant import from the same package - org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.nodemanager.containermanager.localizer.LocalResourceRequest.
Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - org.apache.hadoop.yarn.api.records.LocalResourceType.*.
Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - org.apache.hadoop.yarn.api.records.LocalResourceVisibility.*.
Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - org.junit.Assert.*.
